Citations should be placed after the specific claims they support and cover all critical inputs (QFDWCTAYB; GX057ADL7; SK994CBWR; TN66GHPAT; 4LQD15CFU; 5S9GJV2O3; UVEQ2SJ0W; HWGNUP2XG) with no extraneous IDs.
